mapper.select: SELECT P.POSITION, e.EMP_NAME , e.EMP_CODE , TO_CHAR(w.HIREDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd' ) HIREDATE , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') SETTLEMENT_DATE , TRUNC(SYSDATE - w.HIREDATE) WORKING_DATE , round( p.BASE_SALARY * (SYSDATE - w.HIREDATE) /365 , -1) RETIREMENT_SALARY FROM EMP e , POSITION p , WORK_INFO w WHERE e.POSITION_CODE = p.POSITION_CODE AND e.EMP_CODE=w.EMP_CODE AND SYSDATE>=w.HIREDATE+365 AND e.EMP_CODE=#{empCode}
